{
    "id": 2,
    "drug_name": "Alteplase",
    "iv_fluid": "NaCl 0.9%",
    "storage": "Store below 25\u2103 in original packaging. Protect from light.",
    "pH": "4.5-7.5",
    "incompatible_drugs": [
        "bivalirudin",
        "dobutamine",
        "dopamine",
        "glyceryl trinitrate",
        "heparin sodium."
    ],
    "type_of_incompatibility": [
        "{\n    \"dose\": \"Alteplase 1mg/ml in Reconstituted solution Undiluted \\u02df Bivalirudin 5mg/ml in D5W \\u2013 F4 5%\",\n    \"type\": \"Physical incompatible\",\n    \"reason\": \"Microaggregates not visible in normal room light appeared immediately upon mixing.\"\n}",
        "{\n    \"dose\": \"Alteplase 1mg/ml in Reconstituted solution Undiluted \\u02df Dobutamine 8mg/ml in D5W \\u2013 Dextrose 5%\",\n    \"type\": \"Physical incompatibility\",\n    \"reason\": \"Haze detected by spectrophotometry in 20 minutes. Haze and crystals became visible in 2 hours and grew more dense through 6 days.\"\n}",
        "{\n    \"dose\": \"Alteplase 1mg/ml in Reconstituted solution Undiluted \\u02df Dopamine 8mg/ml in D5W \\u2013 Dextrose 5%\",\n    \"type\": \"Physical incompatibility\",\n    \"reason\": \"Haze and trace crystals became visible in 4 hours and became more dense through 6 days.\"\n}",
        "{\n    \"dose\": \"Alteplase 1mg/ml in Reconstituted solution Undiluted \\u02df Heparin 100 units/ml in D5W \\u2013 Dextrose 5%\",\n    \"type\": \"Physical incompatibility\",\n    \"reason\": \"Haze and crystals became visible by 24 hours.\"\n}"
    ]
}
